meanings.sent1: I will unsaturate the solution by adding more solvent.
meanings.sent2: She unsaturates the oil by removing some of the hydrogen atoms.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to unsaturate the dish by using less butter.
meanings.sent4: His goal is to unsaturate the market with innovative products.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes unsaturate the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Not saturated; capable of dissolving more of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The unsaturate soil quickly absorbed the rainwater.
meanings.sent2: The unsaturate solution allowed for more sugar to dissolve.
meanings.sent3: The unsaturate sponge soaked up the spilled milk in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an unsaturate sponge, always eager to learn.
meanings.sent5: The unsaturate fabric absorbed the dye easily, creating a vivid color.
